name: Tabi Vs Shaggy
description:
After Gilfriend and Boyfriend meet Tabi, he will do everything possible to complete his revenge, but no one imagined that Shaggy would be there, so after destroying the whole place, Shaggy will arrive without imagining that Gilfriend and Boyfriend would be part of it. , but he will be so mad at Tabi for interrupting his Instinct Power, so Shaggy will take Boyfriend's place in the third song. 

You can play as Shaggy in the third song.
